These are the user uploaded subtitles that are being translated: 1 00:00:15,133 --> 00:00:18,367 (energetic drum music) 2 00:00:23,233 --> 00:00:25,533 - I first went to see GG Allin and his band perform 3 00:00:25,533 --> 00:00:29,133 at the Lizmar Lounge in New York City sometime in 1988. 4 00:00:29,133 --> 00:00:31,567 The show began and ended with GG stumbling down the stairs 5 00:00:31,567 --> 00:00:33,233 leading to the stage. 6 00:00:33,233 --> 00:00:34,433 He had done too much heroin 7 00:00:34,433 --> 00:00:35,833 and couldn't go through with the show. 8 00:00:35,833 --> 00:00:37,400 But his fans managed to get their money's worth 9 00:00:37,400 --> 00:00:38,633 by repeatedly kicking him 10 00:00:38,633 --> 00:00:41,567 and breaking bottles over his head. 11 00:00:41,567 --> 00:00:43,300 When I left the club he was still out cold 12 00:00:43,300 --> 00:00:45,700 by the foot of the stairs. 13 00:00:45,700 --> 00:00:47,400 After that GG spent a few years in jail 14 00:00:47,400 --> 00:00:50,167 for assaulting a young woman in Michigan. 15 00:00:50,167 --> 00:00:52,800 It was then that I met Merle, GG's brother and bass player, 16 00:00:52,800 --> 00:00:56,200 and told him of my idea to do a documentary on GG. 17 00:00:56,200 --> 00:00:57,733 He got me touch with GG, 18 00:00:57,733 --> 00:00:59,567 who by now had completed two years of his sentence, 19 00:00:59,567 --> 00:01:01,900 and was on parole in Michigan. 20 00:01:01,900 --> 00:01:03,667 He liked the idea, and offered to skip parole 21 00:01:03,667 --> 00:01:06,933 and head for New York to kick off a US tour. 22 00:01:06,933 --> 00:01:08,300 I sent him a one-way bus ticket, 23 00:01:08,300 --> 00:01:10,633 and he arrived the next day. 24 00:01:17,433 --> 00:01:21,667 - Grab onto your bowels, you're about to meet your God. 25 00:01:21,667 --> 00:01:24,100 You'll slide back, don't you know what you're gonna get 26 00:01:24,100 --> 00:01:26,500 during the next 40 minutes or so. 27 00:01:26,500 --> 00:01:29,400 So get down on your knees. 28 00:01:29,400 --> 00:01:30,967 No, no, wait for that. 29 00:01:30,967 --> 00:01:33,733 Right now, you're gonna hear the only true 30 00:01:33,733 --> 00:01:37,400 rock and roller left in the world, GG Allin. 31 00:01:54,367 --> 00:01:57,067 * The faggots with AIDS are all gonna fry 32 00:01:57,067 --> 00:02:00,100 * You stuck it up an ass tonight now we're gonna die 33 00:02:00,100 --> 00:02:03,067 * Die when you die when you die you're gonna die 34 00:02:03,067 --> 00:02:06,300 - We the jury, find the defendant, Kevin Michael Allin, 35 00:02:06,300 --> 00:02:09,667 guilty of disorderly conduct as charged in the complaint. 36 00:02:09,667 --> 00:02:12,467 - With the narrow-minded hypocritical puppets in society 37 00:02:12,467 --> 00:02:15,733 trying to kill rock and roll, and they can't do it. 38 00:02:15,733 --> 00:02:18,700 * The KKK took them niggers out to die 39 00:02:18,700 --> 00:02:21,567 * When the black meat's burnin' I hope he's gonna die 40 00:02:21,567 --> 00:02:25,733 * Die when you die when you die you're gonna die 41 00:02:26,933 --> 00:02:30,833 * Die when you die when you die you're gonna die 42 00:02:37,633 --> 00:02:41,667 * I talked to my bitch but she was a guy 43 00:02:41,667 --> 00:02:42,900 - (muffled) It's nothing new. 44 00:02:42,900 --> 00:02:44,467 He's done the same thing over and over, 45 00:02:44,467 --> 00:02:46,967 with 10 or 15 different bands. 46 00:02:47,867 --> 00:02:50,067 Once, he even took a microphone 47 00:02:50,067 --> 00:02:53,133 and slammed it into his clenched mouth, 48 00:02:53,133 --> 00:02:55,633 breaking six of his own teeth. 49 00:02:59,333 --> 00:03:02,067 * You got cancer so go fuckin' die 50 00:03:02,067 --> 00:03:04,933 * If you got AIDS spread it around and take some lives 51 00:03:04,933 --> 00:03:09,100 * Die when you die when you die you're gonna die 52 00:03:10,300 --> 00:03:14,233 * Die when you die when you die you're gonna die 53 00:03:16,800 --> 00:03:17,633 - Unk. 54 00:03:20,967 --> 00:03:22,700 Yeah, my name's Unk. 55 00:03:22,700 --> 00:03:24,700 What I like about GG is, 56 00:03:25,900 --> 00:03:28,300 when I first discovered him, 57 00:03:28,300 --> 00:03:30,867 it was a review of this video. 58 00:03:30,867 --> 00:03:33,233 It said, watch GG stick a bottle in his ass. 59 00:03:33,233 --> 00:03:35,067 Watch GG beat up his band members. 60 00:03:35,067 --> 00:03:37,067 Watch GG take a shit and roll in glass. 61 00:03:37,067 --> 00:03:38,400 I'm like, yeah this guy's cool. 62 00:03:38,400 --> 00:03:39,900 This is punk rock. 63 00:03:42,100 --> 00:03:44,800 So, I went and checked out a bunch of GG's stuff. 64 00:03:44,800 --> 00:03:46,633 - You know it depends on the person he's around, 65 00:03:46,633 --> 00:03:50,100 and what's going through his mind. 66 00:03:50,100 --> 00:03:51,700 He can be normal one minute, 67 00:03:51,700 --> 00:03:55,867 and he can turn on you like an animal in the next minute. 68 00:04:08,600 --> 00:04:11,767 I think this tour will probably be, 69 00:04:11,767 --> 00:04:14,400 the craziest tour yet. 70 00:04:14,400 --> 00:04:16,967 It's just gonna be a total war. 71 00:04:18,900 --> 00:04:19,733 Anything goes, 72 00:04:19,733 --> 00:04:21,900 which pretty much 73 00:04:21,900 --> 00:04:23,667 can sum up any GG tour. 74 00:04:23,667 --> 00:04:25,467 You never really know what's gonna happen, 75 00:04:25,467 --> 00:04:28,267 but you know you've gotta be prepared, 76 00:04:28,267 --> 00:04:29,433 for the worst. 77 00:04:30,667 --> 00:04:33,567 - In your future, what about plans? 78 00:04:34,833 --> 00:04:37,600 - Stay one step ahead of the law. 79 00:04:38,767 --> 00:04:40,200 I don't know, I don't think about the future. 80 00:04:40,200 --> 00:04:41,733 I think about what's happenin' today, I don't. 81 00:04:41,733 --> 00:04:42,933 Fuck tomorrow. 82 00:04:42,933 --> 00:04:44,867 I don't know, it's really not important. 83 00:04:44,867 --> 00:04:48,700 As long as I don't get arrested today. 84 00:04:48,700 --> 00:04:49,833 Whatever, just fuck it. 85 00:04:49,833 --> 00:04:51,067 Whatever's happenin' today 86 00:04:51,067 --> 00:04:52,267 is the only thing that really matters. 87 00:04:52,267 --> 00:04:55,333 Tomorrow, we'll get there when we get there. 88 00:04:55,333 --> 00:04:57,600 - As far as the whole tour. 89 00:04:58,533 --> 00:05:00,800 Finishing the whole tour is, 90 00:05:00,800 --> 00:05:02,833 you never plan on going on the road. 91 00:05:02,833 --> 00:05:06,867 You never plan on finishing the whole tour. 92 00:05:06,867 --> 00:05:07,933 - Why's that? 93 00:05:08,800 --> 00:05:09,633 - Usually, 94 00:05:11,067 --> 00:05:13,200 there's two reasons. 95 00:05:13,200 --> 00:05:15,367 Prison -- or the hospital. 96 00:05:33,467 --> 00:05:35,900 (punk music) 97 00:05:59,067 --> 00:06:00,700 The current lineup 98 00:06:00,700 --> 00:06:03,433 for GG Allin and the Murder Junkies is, 99 00:06:03,433 --> 00:06:04,600 of course, GG, 100 00:06:05,500 --> 00:06:06,767 myself on bass, 101 00:06:08,367 --> 00:06:10,100 Bill Weber on guitar, 102 00:06:11,833 --> 00:06:13,100 and vocals, and 103 00:06:14,233 --> 00:06:15,667 Dino is on drums. 104 00:06:18,467 --> 00:06:22,067 Dino's the perfect drummer for this band because, 105 00:06:22,067 --> 00:06:23,467 he's just a 106 00:06:23,467 --> 00:06:26,167 total, hard-hitting psycho. 107 00:06:26,167 --> 00:06:28,067 You know, doesn't care about anything 108 00:06:28,067 --> 00:06:30,233 but just playing his drums. 109 00:06:32,467 --> 00:06:35,200 He doesn't really know what's goin' on. 110 00:06:35,200 --> 00:06:36,200 He's just there, 111 00:06:36,200 --> 00:06:37,767 he keeps the beat, 112 00:06:37,767 --> 00:06:39,067 he's a pounder, 113 00:06:39,067 --> 00:06:40,967 and he's fuckin' psycho. 114 00:06:40,967 --> 00:06:43,200 He's perfect for the band. 115 00:06:43,200 --> 00:06:46,567 - Dino, tell me something about yourself. 116 00:06:46,567 --> 00:06:48,300 What are you like? 117 00:06:48,300 --> 00:06:50,200 - What am I like? 118 00:06:50,200 --> 00:06:52,233 Why, I'm just peace and love, 119 00:06:52,233 --> 00:06:54,633 in the midst of all violence. 120 00:06:56,400 --> 00:06:59,300 And I am free, legal, and innocent. 121 00:07:01,267 --> 00:07:04,700 Squid, Theo, Gina, Sindi, Becky, 122 00:07:04,700 --> 00:07:06,867 Lunachicks are number one. 123 00:07:08,700 --> 00:07:09,533 GG Rock, 124 00:07:10,867 --> 00:07:13,700 Led Zeppelin, Jimi Hendrix, Brook. 125 00:07:15,200 --> 00:07:17,367 - Dino, the naked drummer. 126 00:07:19,467 --> 00:07:20,567 Dino believes 127 00:07:21,767 --> 00:07:23,100 that he's immortal. 128 00:07:23,100 --> 00:07:25,800 He believes he's free of all law. 129 00:07:25,800 --> 00:07:26,967 And he believes he's 130 00:07:26,967 --> 00:07:29,800 telepathically connected to the Lunachicks. 131 00:07:29,800 --> 00:07:33,067 And he believes that they love him. 132 00:07:33,067 --> 00:07:33,867 And Dino's 133 00:07:35,233 --> 00:07:38,133 done time for exposing himself to people. 134 00:07:38,133 --> 00:07:39,967 - What about that? 135 00:07:39,967 --> 00:07:43,800 - Dino exposed his schwing to a little girl, 136 00:07:43,800 --> 00:07:45,733 and did time, 137 00:07:45,733 --> 00:07:47,400 and later when asked about it, 138 00:07:47,400 --> 00:07:50,167 said, ah, I was just teasin' her. 139 00:07:55,967 --> 00:07:57,767 - I don't always play naked. 140 00:07:57,767 --> 00:08:01,367 Sometimes I do it, or most of the time. 141 00:08:01,367 --> 00:08:03,900 There are physical reasons for it. 142 00:08:03,900 --> 00:08:04,800 Because of, 143 00:08:06,433 --> 00:08:08,500 if I wear clothing, 144 00:08:08,500 --> 00:08:09,733 I play very heavily, 145 00:08:09,733 --> 00:08:13,233 and I sit very hard on the drum seat and I, 146 00:08:13,233 --> 00:08:14,633 irritate my skin, 147 00:08:16,367 --> 00:08:18,467 severely sometimes and it 148 00:08:18,467 --> 00:08:20,300 really hurts and if I sit on plastic 149 00:08:20,300 --> 00:08:22,700 or on a good vinyl seat, 150 00:08:22,700 --> 00:08:25,467 with nothing underneath, I don't get hurt. 151 00:08:25,467 --> 00:08:28,167 That's basically the main reason. 152 00:08:28,167 --> 00:08:29,400 Then there's also the fact 153 00:08:29,400 --> 00:08:31,567 that it's a thrill to the audience. 154 00:08:31,567 --> 00:08:33,600 And it is often requested, 155 00:08:33,600 --> 00:08:35,400 because I have done it, and I am known to play naked, 156 00:08:35,400 --> 00:08:38,067 so when people see me they ask me to play naked, 157 00:08:38,067 --> 00:08:41,067 in the audience and things like that. 158 00:08:44,767 --> 00:08:46,800 - The whole thing was supposed to last 159 00:08:46,800 --> 00:08:48,333 maybe a year or two. 160 00:08:48,333 --> 00:08:51,433 It was just something that I wanted to get out of me. 161 00:08:51,433 --> 00:08:55,400 And as the thing escalated and went on, 162 00:08:55,400 --> 00:08:57,533 I realized that there was just so much more 163 00:08:57,533 --> 00:08:59,400 that I had to do. 164 00:08:59,400 --> 00:09:03,467 And the more I did, the more I wanted to do. 165 00:09:03,467 --> 00:09:04,667 I just said, fuck it. 166 00:09:04,667 --> 00:09:07,533 I'm gonna just take over the world. 167 00:09:09,800 --> 00:09:13,867 So at that point, I had begun to lose band members, 168 00:09:13,867 --> 00:09:18,567 because I just outgrew everybody that I ever played with. 169 00:09:18,567 --> 00:09:22,900 Everybody, it got to the point where I was just, 170 00:09:22,900 --> 00:09:27,133 uncontrollable, and the Jabbers dissolved, 171 00:09:27,133 --> 00:09:28,433 because they couldn't control me, 172 00:09:28,433 --> 00:09:32,433 no matter what I said, I do what I wanted to do. 173 00:09:36,067 --> 00:09:37,533 - So, you toured with the band. 174 00:09:37,533 --> 00:09:38,800 What made you decide 175 00:09:38,800 --> 00:09:41,800 to quit GG Allin and the Murder Junkies? 176 00:09:41,800 --> 00:09:43,933 - Well, the band is going nowhere. 177 00:09:43,933 --> 00:09:46,233 I don't believe in GG anymore. 178 00:09:46,233 --> 00:09:47,533 I don't believe in what he's doing. 179 00:09:47,533 --> 00:09:50,567 I don't think he's doing anything, 180 00:09:50,567 --> 00:09:53,067 except like just doing shows. 181 00:09:54,200 --> 00:09:58,133 Occasionally, something interesting will happen. 182 00:09:58,133 --> 00:09:59,733 On a whole, the band, 183 00:09:59,733 --> 00:10:02,300 it was more or less boring. 184 00:10:02,300 --> 00:10:05,233 - It's been said that beauty is in the eye of the beholder, 185 00:10:05,233 --> 00:10:07,000 and nowhere is that more true 186 00:10:07,000 --> 00:10:09,400 than in my studio today. 187 00:10:09,400 --> 00:10:11,067 Let's meet these artists now, 188 00:10:11,067 --> 00:10:13,267 and we'll also meet those who feel their work 189 00:10:13,267 --> 00:10:15,000 is nothing but smut. 190 00:10:15,000 --> 00:10:16,600 This is GG Allin. 191 00:10:16,600 --> 00:10:18,300 GG is a rock and roller 192 00:10:18,300 --> 00:10:22,467 who makes the most wild punk groups pale in comparison. 193 00:10:22,467 --> 00:10:24,167 I don't know if you'll recall this, 194 00:10:24,167 --> 00:10:26,467 but he made the news recently, GG did, 195 00:10:26,467 --> 00:10:29,600 when it was revealed that he relieved himself 196 00:10:29,600 --> 00:10:30,833 on stage, live. 197 00:10:32,333 --> 00:10:35,233 Why GG, did you feel a need to 198 00:10:35,233 --> 00:10:37,800 to defecate in front of a live audience? 199 00:10:37,800 --> 00:10:40,867 - Well, my body is the rock and roll temple. 200 00:10:40,867 --> 00:10:44,367 And my flesh, blood, and body fluids, 201 00:10:44,367 --> 00:10:46,033 are a communion to the people, 202 00:10:46,033 --> 00:10:47,133 whether they like it or not. 203 00:10:47,133 --> 00:10:49,633 I'm not out to please anybody. 204 00:10:49,633 --> 00:10:52,167 My rock and roll is more 205 00:10:52,167 --> 00:10:54,433 not to entertain, but to annihilate. 206 00:10:54,433 --> 00:10:57,033 I'm trying to bring danger back into rock and roll. 207 00:10:57,033 --> 00:10:59,600 And there are no limits, and no laws. 208 00:10:59,600 --> 00:11:01,633 And I'll break down every barrier put in front of me, 209 00:11:01,633 --> 00:11:03,300 until the day I die. 210 00:11:04,333 --> 00:11:05,533 (cheers) 211 00:11:05,533 --> 00:11:07,467 - The applause, in case you are curious, 212 00:11:07,467 --> 00:11:09,167 is coming from a 213 00:11:09,167 --> 00:11:12,967 GG Allin fan club there in the first two rows. 214 00:11:12,967 --> 00:11:15,600 Notice, the cool mustache on the third guy in, 215 00:11:15,600 --> 00:11:16,433 on the first row. 216 00:11:16,433 --> 00:11:17,267 You get a shot of him? 217 00:11:17,267 --> 00:11:18,100 - Merle. 218 00:11:18,100 --> 00:11:19,067 - What's his name? 219 00:11:19,067 --> 00:11:20,233 - That's my brother, Merle. 220 00:11:20,233 --> 00:11:21,067 He's my bass player for the Murder Junkies. 221 00:11:21,067 --> 00:11:22,300 - Oh is it? Alright. 222 00:11:22,300 --> 00:11:23,500 Great, I love that mustache is really 223 00:11:23,500 --> 00:11:25,400 a happening, happening. 224 00:11:28,233 --> 00:11:29,533 - About a week before the first show, 225 00:11:29,533 --> 00:11:31,400 I found myself driving in a rental van, 226 00:11:31,400 --> 00:11:34,067 with GG, Merle, and the band's newest addition, 227 00:11:34,067 --> 00:11:35,267 Dee Dee Ramone. 228 00:11:36,667 --> 00:11:41,067 - Dee Dee, what made you decide to join the Murder Junkies? 229 00:11:41,067 --> 00:11:42,067 - So that's the name? 230 00:11:42,067 --> 00:11:43,567 I didn't know that was the name. 231 00:11:43,567 --> 00:11:46,500 I thought it was the GG Allin band. 232 00:11:49,867 --> 00:11:52,600 I joined it 'cause I wanted to have some fun, 233 00:11:52,600 --> 00:11:53,867 and play a little. 234 00:11:53,867 --> 00:11:56,567 And not have any responsibility. 235 00:11:56,567 --> 00:11:57,567 - We had been drinking heavily, 236 00:11:57,567 --> 00:11:59,100 and as we drove down 9th Avenue, 237 00:11:59,100 --> 00:12:00,567 GG opened up the van door and began 238 00:12:00,567 --> 00:12:03,133 throwing beer bottles at some hookers. 239 00:12:03,133 --> 00:12:05,267 I wasn't worried because I knew at 30 miles an hour, 240 00:12:05,267 --> 00:12:07,167 he was too drunk to hit anything, 241 00:12:07,167 --> 00:12:09,500 let alone a prostitute. 242 00:12:09,500 --> 00:12:11,100 One week later, Dee Dee quit the band, 243 00:12:11,100 --> 00:12:15,367 claiming it had nothing to do with that incident. 244 00:12:15,367 --> 00:12:17,467 That night we decided to set up a solo performance 245 00:12:17,467 --> 00:12:19,933 for GG at New York University. 246 00:12:19,933 --> 00:12:21,833 I got the okay from university officials, 247 00:12:21,833 --> 00:12:23,267 and that Thursday, we set up to film 248 00:12:23,267 --> 00:12:26,067 at the Loeb Student Center. 249 00:12:26,067 --> 00:12:29,300 - We're gonna play with a banana today. 250 00:12:39,633 --> 00:12:42,400 The name of the song's Dead Fuck. 251 00:12:42,400 --> 00:12:43,233 Watch. 252 00:13:00,800 --> 00:13:02,367 Are you hungry? 253 00:13:02,367 --> 00:13:04,633 (laughter) 254 00:13:10,833 --> 00:13:12,067 Okay, now. 255 00:13:12,067 --> 00:13:13,400 Everybody all get naked. 256 00:13:13,400 --> 00:13:17,367 Everybody get their, powerful clothing. 257 00:13:17,367 --> 00:13:19,067 Worn powerful clothing. 258 00:13:19,067 --> 00:13:20,400 Anything. 259 00:13:20,400 --> 00:13:23,467 You got your head up here in a cloud. 260 00:13:24,533 --> 00:13:26,067 More power. 261 00:13:26,067 --> 00:13:28,167 You can have the leftovers. 262 00:13:28,167 --> 00:13:30,767 Worn powerful clothing. 263 00:13:30,767 --> 00:13:32,067 They're leaving. 264 00:13:32,067 --> 00:13:35,133 You can tell who the fuckin' sissies are. 265 00:13:36,067 --> 00:13:37,833 Alright, no clothing. 266 00:13:43,500 --> 00:13:46,233 Give me some clothing, now. 267 00:13:46,233 --> 00:13:48,300 Or I'm out of here. 268 00:13:48,300 --> 00:13:49,800 Something up here. 269 00:13:54,900 --> 00:13:59,067 So I'll have a little (muffled) pee (muffled). 270 00:14:02,733 --> 00:14:04,400 Don't all leave now. 271 00:14:05,400 --> 00:14:06,567 Shit, you are. 272 00:14:07,767 --> 00:14:08,933 Talk about it. 273 00:14:11,500 --> 00:14:14,367 Come on, don't leave so soon. 274 00:14:14,367 --> 00:14:15,200 See ya. 275 00:14:21,067 --> 00:14:24,733 (confused yelling) 276 00:14:24,733 --> 00:14:25,967 - Get him fucking out. 277 00:14:25,967 --> 00:14:29,867 Shut that fucking (muffled), now. 278 00:14:30,900 --> 00:14:33,500 * Fuck the law 279 00:14:34,667 --> 00:14:38,767 * Kill kill kill kill them motherfucking asses 280 00:14:41,733 --> 00:14:44,933 * Fuck authority fuck authority 281 00:14:44,933 --> 00:14:49,167 * Kill the president and seniority 282 00:14:49,167 --> 00:14:51,267 - I thought he was gonna cry. 283 00:14:51,267 --> 00:14:52,767 He was like smiling, but I swear, 284 00:14:52,767 --> 00:14:55,767 I thought he was gonna start crying. 285 00:14:56,800 --> 00:14:59,800 (audience chanting) 286 00:15:03,267 --> 00:15:04,300 -
